34F438F6.VoiceDir33.BC41C: Somber. Grateful. Reverent. This is a serious honor.

4AC993A7.Line31.BC41C: I’m healing well... thanks to the herbs Tala carried in her pack. She was a skilled healer and a cunning warrior.

E4BE0D29.Line33.BC41C: We offer you Tala’s dagger as a token of our thanks. Remember her name, and carry it well.
